mapper.select: SELECT ub.used_book_id, ub.title, ub.discount, ub.description, ub.created_at, ub.status, u.user_id, u.user_nickname, bc.book_condition_id, bc.condition, bi.book_id, bi.book_name, bi.book_author, bi.book_price, bi.book_publisher, bi.book_publication_date, bi.book_isbn, ubi.used_book_image_id, ubi.original_image_name, ubi.stored_image_name FROM used_book ub JOIN users u ON ub.user_id = u.user_id JOIN book_condition bc ON ub.book_condition_id = bc.book_condition_id JOIN book_information bi ON ub.book_id = bi.book_id LEFT JOIN used_book_image ubi ON ub.used_book_id = ubi.used_book_id where ub.used_book_id = #{used_book_id}
mapper.insert: insert into book_information (book_image, book_name, book_author, book_price, book_publisher, book_publication_date, book_isbn) values (#{book_image}, #{book_name}, #{book_author}, #{book_price}, #{book_publisher}, #{book_publication_date}, #{book_isbn})

insert into used_book (title, discount, description, user_id, book_condition_id, book_id, image_check) values (#{title}, #{discount}, #{description}, #{user_id}, #{book_condition_id}, #{book_id}, #{image_check})
insert into used_book_image (used_book_id , original_image_name, stored_image_name) values (#{used_book_id}, #{original_image_name}, #{stored_image_name})
mapper.select: select user_id from users where user_email = #{username}

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT ub.used_book_id) FROM used_book ub JOIN users u ON ub.user_id = u.user_id JOIN book_condition bc ON ub.book_condition_id = bc.book_condition_id JOIN book_information bi ON ub.book_id = bi.book_id LEFT JOIN used_book_image ubi ON ub.used_book_id = ubi.used_book_id
AND ub.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKey}, '%')
